Text: Praise the LORD, all you nations; extol Him, all you peoples.
Context: This verse calls on all nations and peoples to praise the LORD, indicating a unifying command for universal praise.

Text: For great is His loving devotion toward us, and the faithfulness of the LORD endures forever. Hallelujah!
Context: The verse expresses the greatness of God’s love and faithfulness which lasts forever, concluding with an exclamation of praise, ”Hallelujah!“
